original_title: NPP tops postal votes in Ratnapura District
original_body_lines: The National People’s Power (NPP) has obtained the highest number of postal votes in the Ratnapura District in the 2024 General Election.
Accordingly, the NPP has polled 24,776 postal votes, while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) came second with 2,969 postal votes.
